summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 156, Gilman's Addition, being the alley between West Halladay Street and West Smith Street from Thorndyke Avenue to 24th Avenue West; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16633 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
